/usr/bin/g++-10  -Wall -Wextra -fmax-errors=1 -fanalyzer -Wshadow -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wpedantic -g  -Wl,--no-as-needed CMakeFiles/MEMCHECK_hardware_test.dir/hardware_test.cpp.o -o MEMCHECK_hardware_test  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64 ../libmy_cxx_lib_hardware.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so ../../util/libmy_cxx_lib_util.a ../../log/libmy_cxx_lib_log.a -lpthread 
/home/cyy/opt/bin/cmake -E __run_co_compile --lwyu=MEMCHECK_hardware_test
